DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate safety efficacy MK0991 patient deep-seated mycoses .
DOC.brief_title: A Clinical Study MK0991 ( Caspofungin ) Japanese Patients With Deep-seated Candida Aspergillus Infections ( 0991-062 ) ( COMPLETED )
DOC.criteria: Japanese Patients In Whom A Causative Fungus Is Detected Before Treatment With The Study Drug Or Patients With Strongly Suspected DeepSeated Fungal Infection Due To Candida specie ( Spp . ) Or Aspergillus Spp . Patients With Mycoses Other Than Ones Due To Candida Spp . Or Aspergillus Spp . Patients Who Will Receive Other Systemic Antifungal Agents For The First Time In Screening Period .
